title: Manage Asphalt Sales Order
description: A sales rep for a refinery's asphalt business takes an order from a paving company for a specific grade of asphalt.

tasks.description: Identify the paving company customer and their contract pricing for 'PG 64-22' grade asphalt.
tasks.expected_outcome: The customer's account and pricing are retrieved.

tasks.description: Check the inventory of the required asphalt grade in the heated storage tanks.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system confirms that sufficient inventory is available.

tasks.description: Create a sales order and schedule a time for the customer's trucks to pick up the asphalt from the refinery.
tasks.expected_outcome: A sales order is created, and a pickup appointment is scheduled.
